name: UIAlertViewStyle
desc: The presentation style of the alert.

items.name: case secureTextInput
items.desc: An alert that allows the user to enter text. The text field is obscured.

items.name: case plainTextInput
items.desc: An alert that allows the user to enter text.

items.name: case loginAndPasswordInput
items.desc: An alert that allows the user to enter a login identifier and password.
